name: HeatwaveTest1
description:
The earth is set in the future and climate temperate have increased.

Whilst making your way through the level in the shadows avoiding scavengers, collect documentation, plant life and key to unlock the exit gate. 

Survey Link - https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=i103o5ut0E2_FaPbFw9uVr_ygVSp...

Controls

Movement on keyboard - W,A,S,D 

U key - Inventory

I key - Collectibles

Xbox controller - 

X Key - Pick up item

Left shoulder button - Inventory

Right  button shoulder - Collectibles

Left back trigger - Run
